coreAttributes.name: nipple web-seal
coreAttributes.description: Layers of sticky spider-webbing have been shot all over [npc.namePos] [npc.nipples+], completely sealing them and preventing them from being accessed!

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] spinneret to quickly shoot a thick binding of spider-webbing all over [npc.her] [npc.nipples+].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] spinneret to quickly shoot a thick binding of spider-webbing all over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.nipples+].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(use)] [npc.her] spinneret to quickly shoot a thick binding of spider-webbing all over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.nipples+].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the webbing which was covering [npc.her] [npc.nipples] and [npc.verb(throw)] it away.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the webbing which was covering [npc2.namePos] [npc2.nipples] and [npc.verb(throw)] it away.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(tear)] off the webbing which was covering [npc2.namePos] [npc2.nipples] and [npc.verb(throw)] it away.
